  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205417</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Family Business: Ruth Asawa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Familie Geschäft: Ruth Asawa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Affaires de Famille : Ruth Asawa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Negócio Da Família: Ruth Asawa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio Della Famiglia: Ruth Asawa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η οικογενειακή επιχείρηση: Θ*Ρuτχ Asawa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Negocio De la Familia: Ruth Asawa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Sculptor Ruth Asawa has been associated with some of the most notable figures in American 20th century art: Josef Albers, Buckminster Fuller, John Cage, Merce Cunningham, Robert Rauschenberg, and Jasper Johns. This Educator Guide is dedicated to highlighting arts education in the Bay Area and the model programs established by Asawa and her family.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sculptor Ruth Asawa hat auf einige der 
bemerkenswertesten Abbildungen in der 20. Jahrhundertkunst des 
Amerikaners bezogen: Josef Albers, Buckminster voller, John 
Rahmen, Merce Cunningham, Robert Rauschenberg und Jaspis Johns. 
Diese Erzieher-Anleitung wird dem Markieren von von 
kunstausbildung im Bucht-Bereich und in den vorbildlichen Programmen 
eingesetzt, die von Asawa und von ihrer Familie hergestellt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le sculpteur Ruth Asawa a été associé à
certaines des figures les plus notables dans le 20ème art de siècle 
d'Américain : Josef Albers, Buckminster plus plein, camp de 
John, Merce Cunningham, Robert Rauschenberg, et jaspe Johns. Ce 
guide d'éducateur est consacré à mettre en valeur l'éducation 
d'arts dans la région de compartiment et les programmes modèles 
établis par Asawa et sa famille.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sculptor Ruth Asawa foi associado com as algumas
das figuras as mais notáveis arte do século do americano na 20a: 
Josef Albers, Buckminster mais cheio, gaiola de John, Merce 
Cunningham, Robert Rauschenberg, e jasper Johns. Esta guia do 
educador é dedicada a destacar a instrução das artes na área da 
baía e nos programas modelo estabelecidos por Asawa e por sua 
família.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scultore Ruth Asawa è stato associato con 
alcune delle figure più notevoli nella ventesima arte di secolo 
dell'americano: Josef Albers, Buckminster più pieno, gabbia del
John, Merce Cunningham, Robert Rauschenberg e diaspro Johns. 
Questa guida dell'educatore è dedicata ad evidenziare la 
formazione di arti nella zona della baia e nei programmi di modello 
stabiliti da Asawa e dalla sua famiglia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο γλύπτης Ruth Asawa έχει συνδεθεί με μερικούς 
από τους πιό ξεχωριστούς αριθμούς στην αμερικανική τέχνη του 
20ού αιώνα: Θ*Ιοσεφ Albers, Buckminster πληρέστερο, 
John Cage, Merce Cunningham, Robert Rauschenberg, 
και ιάσπιδα Johns. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
αφιερώνεται να δώσει έμφαση στην αισθητική αγωγή στην περιοχή 
κόλπων και τα πρότυπα προγράμματα που καθιερώνονται από Asawa 
και την οικογένειά της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Han asociado al escultor Ruth Asawa a algunas de 
las figuras más notables del vigésimo arte del siglo del americano: 
José Albers, Buckminster más lleno, jaula de Juan, Merce 
Cunningham, Roberto Rauschenberg, y jaspe Johns. Esta guía del 
educador se dedica a destacar la educación de los artes en el área 
de la bahía y los programas modelo establecidos por Asawa y su 
familia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          </identifier>

        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
